Package no.ntnu.idata.shiporganizer.shiporganizerservice.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idata.shiporganizer.shiporganizerservice.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service used to handle all communication between the User controller and repository

      Use the received verification code to set a new password for the user.
      Parameters:
      email - Email of user.
      verificationCode - Received verification code for user.
      password - New password to set for user.
      Returns:
      True on success.

    • checkValidVerificationCode

      public boolean checkValidVerificationCode(String email, String verificationCode)
      Checks if the verification code is valid for given email address.
      Parameters:
      email - User's email address.
      verificationCode - Verification code received by email.
      Returns:
      True if valid.

    • isUserAdmin

      public boolean isUserAdmin(String token)
      Checks if the user is admin.

      A user is an admin if they have access to a department with admin rights (1).

      Parameters:
      token - Token of user to check admin rights of.
      Returns:
      True if user is admin.
